hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOLL.EOLL_ID, EOLL.EOLL_ORDER_NO, EOLL.EOLL_WORK_NO, EOLL.EOLL_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOLL.EOLL_LOGISTIC_NO, EOLL.EOLL_STATUS_CODE, EOLL.EOLL_STATUS_NAME, EOLL.EOLL_LOG, EOLL.CREATOR, EOLL.CREATE_TIME, EOLL.MODIFIER, EOLL.MODIFY_TIME, EOLL.REC_VER, EOLL.REC_STATUS, EOLL.TIME_ZONE, EOLL.COMPANY_CODE, EOLL.SITE_CODE, EOLL.EOLL_SUBSTR1, EOLL.EOLL_SUBSTR2, EOLL.EOLL_SUBSTR3, EOLL.EOLL_SUBSTR4, EOLL.EOLL_SUBSTR5, EOLL.EOLL_SUBSTR6, EOLL.EOLL_SUBSTR7, EOLL.EOLL_SUBDATE1, EOLL.EOLL_SUBDATE2, EOLL.EOLL_SUBDATE3, EOLL.EOLL_SUBDATE4, EOLL.EOLL_SUBDATE5, EOLL.EOLL_SUBNUM1, EOLL.EOLL_SUBNUM2, EOLL.EOLL_SUBNUM3, EOLL.EOLL_OPERATE_SYS, EOLL.EOLL_METHOD_NAME FROM EO_COMMON_LISTEN_LOG EOLL WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOLL.EOLL_ORDER_NO LIKE :eollOrderNo >> <<AND EOLL.EOLL_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :eollWorkOrderNo >> <<AND EOLL.EOLL_ORDER_NO IN (:orderNos)>> <<AND EOLL.EOLL_WORK_ORDER_NO IN (:workOrderNos)>>
